name: Tiger Story
description:
All donations that i receive will be used to bring better assets and better scripts to the game, so once game is published all of the expirience will be better.

As it is writen above, donations are not needed for download game, its 100% free until it reach full phase for releasing on steam. 

Price on steam will be from 5 euros to 10 euros considering how many assets will be needed for full project!

IMPORTANT: ALL DONATORS OVER 2,49 euros Will RECIVE GAME CODE FOR STEAM FOR FREE ONCE ITS RELEASED!

                                                                                                                                                                                             

BUGS

Bugs are expected even bad performance! Please keep that in mind.

If you find any bug, please take video or screenshot and write small explanation and send me on email, or write it down in comments! Once i recive information it will be fixed and updated in no time!

                                                                                                                                                                                             

Minimum Requirments CPU: Intel® Core™ i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 MEMORY: 4GB RAM GPU: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 2GB DirectX: DirectX 11 Storage: Up to 2GB                                                                                                                                                                                             THANKS Big thanks to everyone who downloaded and played game, leave your opinion and rating from 0 to 10 in comment section!
